pageTitle: Elliot For Water - The search engine that donates water
pageDescription: Elliot for Water is the search engine that donates water every time you search. We use the money generated by your clicks on ads to finance clean water projects in developing countries.
title: Join our community of changemakers!
liter_of_water: Liters of water donated so far by Elliot For Water users

how_works.title: How it Works
how_works.description: Did you ever think making a change in the world could be so simple?

projects.title: Every search with us can truly change a life.
